summary: Test suite that validates a CKAN blanket plugin implementation registers all supported framework interfaces—actions, authentication functions, blueprints, CLI commands, configuration declarations, helper functions, and validators—and confirms they operate correctly when supplied as functions, lambdas, modules, or lists.
business_intent: Ensure the blanket plugin mechanism correctly integrates with the CKAN core by automatically exposing required components, preventing registration errors and guaranteeing consistent plugin behavior across the platform.
